dm-result.description: The test result is reported periodically according to the configured reporting interval in the DM test.

delay.description: The delay data of DM test(units: ns).

delay-variation.description: The delay variation of DM test(units: ns).

average-delay.description: The average delay of DM test(units: ns).

average-delay-variation.description: The average delay variation of DM test(units: ns).

min-delay.description: The minimal delay of DM test(units: ns).

max-delay.description: The maximal delay of DM test(units: ns).

min-delay-variation.description: The manimal delay of DM test(units: ns).

max-delay-variation.description: The maximal delay of DM test(units: ns).

global.description: Configure global Info of FlexE OAM.

oam-switch.description: The switch for turning on or off FlexE OAM function(default:enable).

rdi-to-sf-switch.description: The switch for turning on or off FlexE OAM RDI transform to sf function(default:enable).

ifname.description: The FlexE client interface binded by OAM.

meg-type.description: Configure MEP or MIP parameters of MEG.

local-mep-type.description: The type of local MEP, including source MEP, destination MEP and bidirectional MEP(default:bidirectional MEP).

base-block.description: The switch for turning on or off base block function(default:disable).

block-period.description: The base block period,including 16k,32k,64k,512k and auto(default:16k).

bip-check.description: Include or exclude OAM block in BIP check (default:include).

circle-sequence.description: The switch for turning on or off circle sequence function in the base block(default:enable).

cv.description: The switch for turning on or off the CV function(default:disable).

cv-period.description: The period of sending packets in CV function(default:10s).

cs.description: The switch for turning on or off the CS function(default:disable).

cs-period.description: The period of sending packets in CS function(default:10s).

loss-threshold.description: The exponent of the packet loss threshold(default:9).

sequence-number.description: The fixed sequence number of base block that ranging from 0 to 15(default:0).

cc-bip.description: The switch for turning on or off the CC and BIP function(default:enable).

loss-mantissa.description: The mantissa of the packet loss threshold(default:1).

exc-mantissa.description: The mantissa of the packet EXC threshold(default:1).

exc-threshold.description: The exponent of the packet EXC threshold(default:7).

cs-type.description: The test type of CS function(default:unequipped).

sd-propagate.description: The switch for turning on or off the SD propagate function(default:disable).

base-block.description: The switch for turning on or off base block function(default:disable).

block-period.description: The base block period,including 16k,32k,64k,512k and auto(default:16k).

bip-check.description: Include or exclude OAM block in BIP check (default:include).

circle-sequence.description: The switch for turning on or off circle sequence function in the base block(default:enable).

sequence-number.description: The fixed sequence number of base block that ranging from 0 to 15(default:0).

cc-bip.description: The switch for turning on or off the CC and BIP function(default:enable).

loss-mantissa.description: The mantissa of the packet loss threshold(default:1).

loss-threshold.description: The exponent of the packet loss threshold(default:9).

exc-mantissa.description: The mantissa of the packet EXC threshold(default:1).

exc-threshold.description: The exponent of the packet EXC threshold(default:7).

dm-switch.description: The switch for enable or disable the DM function(default:disable).

period.description: The sending period of on-demand DM packets(default:10s).

report-interval.description: The report interval of the DM test result,the default value is 0s which means don't upsend results until the test stopped.
